title: Component Internationalization (DEPRECATED)
description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED: Per-component i18n overrides will be removed in v0.2.0. Use centralized translations with $t:key references instead. Per-component i18n adds unnecessary complexity and prevents centralized translation management. For context-specific variations, use more specific centralized keys (e.g., payment.submit instead of common.submit with override).

examples._comment: PRIMARY APPROACH: Centralized translations with $t: references
examples.result: Button displays 'Save' in English, 'Enregistrer' in French - translations come from centralized dictionary, no per-component i18n needed

examples._comment: HYBRID APPROACH: $t: reference with per-component override
examples.result: Per-component i18n overrides centralized translation - displays 'Submit Payment' instead of generic 'Submit'. Use for context-specific variations.

examples._comment: FALLBACK APPROACH: Per-component i18n only (legacy pattern, avoid for new code)
examples.result: Only use per-component i18n when translation is truly unique and won't be reused. Prefer $t: for better maintainability.

x-specs.given: multiple components using the same $t: reference key
x-specs.then: all components should display the same translated text without duplication
x-specs.note: Per-component i18n is DEPRECATED in v0.1.1 and will be removed in v0.2.0. Use centralized translations with $t: references instead. Other i18n specs (APP-I18N-001 through APP-I18N-010, APP-I18N-012) removed as they tested deprecated per-component pattern.
